isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - CAB DOOR STRIKER PIN

svcsubproc.title: Remove Cab Door Striker Pin on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 30 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

Cab door striker pin (Item 1) mounted on cab door lock pillar (Item 2) provides for positive engagement with the door latch assembly (Item 7, Figure 56) . Cab door striker pin removal and installation requires a torx head tool (Item 3). Enlarged mounting holes in cab door lock pillar and floating tapped striker pin mounting plate (Item 5) located inside cab door lock pillar permits adjustment.

step1.para: Use a torx head tool (Item 3) and remove two torx head bolts (Item 4) to remove the cab door striker pin (Item 1) from the floating tapped striker pin mounting plate (Item 5) located inside cab door lock pillar (Item 2), driver side shown.

calloutgroup.callout1: 5. FLOATING TAPPED STRIKER PIN MOUNTING PLATE

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove passenger side cab door striker pin.
